scenes.action_text: DALLAS BUYERS CLUB Written by Craig Borten & Melisa Wallack December 2, 2012 1 EXT. RODEO STADIUM - DALLAS - TEXAS - DAY 1 Ambient sounds of the CROWD, RODEO, SEX, and a strange RINGING fade in along with IMAGES of... A COWBOY riding a BULL in an enclosed RODEO ring. RON WOODROOF, early 40's, handsome, long sandy hair, denim clad, worn snakeskin boots, dusty, cowboy hat, mirrored aviators, is engaged in wild SEX with a WOMAN. He
